Uses of Class
com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models.DeploymentSlot

  • Packages that use DeploymentSlot 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute
    This package contains the service management compute class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models
    This package contains the models for the compute management service.
